casebody.data:
In the Matter of V.L.B. No. 188P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Charlotte Gail Blake, Boone, for Father. Gary C. Rhodes, Salisbury, for Mother. Nancy L. Einstein, Attorney Advocate, for Guardian ad Litem. Stephen M. Schoeberle, for Burke County DSS.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of April 2005 by Respondent (Father) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
